heading: 1.1 Simple bar plot
code:
p <- ggplot(mpg, aes(x = class, color = class, fill = class)) +
  geom_bar(alpha = .75) +
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "mako", end = .95) +
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "mako", end = .95) +
  theme_rethink()

ggplotly(p, tooltip = "x")

heading: 2.1 Simple line plot
code:
p <- ggplot(economics, aes(x = date, y = unemploy)) + 
  geom_line() +
  theme_rethink()

ggplotly(p)

heading: 2.2 Multiple lines plot
code:
p <- ggplot(economics_long, aes(x = date, y = value01, 
    color = variable)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "mako", end = .95) +
  theme_rethink()

ggplotly(p)

heading: 3.1 Simple scatter plot
code:
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(alpha = .85) +
  theme_rethink()

ggplotly(p)

heading: 3.2 Multiple scatter plot
code:
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point(alpha = .85) +
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "mako", end = .95) +
  theme_rethink()

ggplotly(p)
